description: NUBes: A Corpus of Negation and Uncertainty in Spanish Clinical Texts
text: Atrovent inh , 2 - 2 - 2 . Enoxaparina 40 mg , sc cada 24 horas . Citalopram 20 mg , 0-1-0 . Ferro Sanol , 1 - 0 - 0 . Espironolactona 25 mg 1-0-0 . Control por su médico de cabecera .
